check_def.descr: Check TCP service availability on the specified host

flag_info.name: host
flag_info.usage: Host target as ip version 4/6 or hostname

flag_info.name: ms_warning
flag_info.usage: If connection time exceed the value, set the return status to "WARNING".

flag_info.name: ms_critical
flag_info.usage: If connection time exceed the value, set the return status to "CRITICAL".

flag_info.name: ms_timeout
flag_info.usage: Abort connection if it exceed the value

flag_info.name: accept
flag_info.usage: If the connexion succeed, set the return status to one of "CRITICAL"|"WARNING"|"OK". "OK" is the default behaviour. If set to something other than "OK", "ms_warning" and "ms_critical" are ignored. Usefull if we want the service monitored to be down, and to be alerted when it comes up
